label: Select whether you enter coordinate as city/country or coordinates

name: Set Function
func:
flow.set("description", msg.payload);
return msg;

name: Get Function
func:
msg.payload = flow.get("description") ;
return msg;

name: place function
func:
msg.payload={ "group": { "hide": ["weather_select_coordinates"], "show": ["weather_Select_location"], "focus": true } }

return msg;

name: coordinates function
func:
msg.payload = { "group": { "hide": ["weather_Select_location"], "show": ["weather_select_coordinates"], "focus": true } }

return msg;

name: Temperature_Function
func:
msg.payload={ "group": { "hide": ["weather_limit_wind","weather_limit_humidity","weather_limit_pressure"], "show": ["weather_limit_temperature"], "focus": true } }

return msg;

name: Pressure_Function
func:
msg.payload = { "group": { "hide": ["weather_limit_wind", "weather_limit_humidity", "weather_limit_temperature"], "show": ["weather_limit_pressure"], "focus": true } }

return msg;

name: Humidity_Function
func:
msg.payload = { "group": { "hide": ["weather_limit_wind", "weather_limit_temperature", "weather_limit_pressure"], "show": ["weather_limit_humidity"], "focus": true } }

return msg;

name: Wind_Function
func:
msg.payload = { "group": { "hide": ["weather_limit_temperature", "weather_limit_humidity", "weather_limit_pressure"], "show": ["weather_limit_wind"], "focus": true } }

return msg;

name: Charts Setting Function
Store_temperature
func:
flow.set("temp_limit", msg.payload);  // Store the temperature limit
return null;
